short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create a reddit match thread request for a match listing on ESPN

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will create quick links to generate a match thread request message to /u/MatchThreadder for applicable games found on ESPN's live scoreboard listings. A reddit account is required to send the generated message.
